thread.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher as resource stocks lead bounce
thread.title_full: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher as resource stocks lead bounce | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher as resource stocks lead bounce
text:
TORONTO Aug 14 Canada's main stock index opened higher on Friday, breaking a volatile three-day losing streak, as a bounce in natural resource shares helped lead the market higher.
The Toronto Stock Exchange's S&P/TSX composite index was up 27.84 points, or 0.2 percent, at 14,266.24. Six of the index's 10 main groups advanced. (Reporting by Solarina Ho ; Editing by Lisa Von Ahn)
